text:
@SecPompeo @DeptofDefense @realDonaldTrump How does trillions of dollars in weapons and military weapons stop us from dying from the coronavirus?

We need an army of doctors and medical professions. Your guns don’t protect Americans from dying. 

#COVID-19
#coronavirus
